title: The William Feather Magazine
additional-note: A 1976 renewal for the 1949 book 'The Business of Life'  by William Feather mentions that the contents of the book were previously published in The William Feature Magazine.  The renewal record does not give dates for the magazine publication(s). The renewal could conceivably apply to copyrights for articles in that magazine as early as 1948, but we have not verified whether it did.
